title: The Open Door
overview: A cunning crisis management ploy turns street vendor Zhou Dajiang into the live-streaming partner of top-tier influencer "Little Jasmine" (Xiao Haimo), catapulting him overnight into the new darling of the live-streaming scene. Riding a wave of viral fame with non-stop trends, the story peels back the curtain: what do influencers' real lives look like without beauty filters? What secrets lie hidden in the live-streaming industry, deeper than a black hole? In this "Influencer Adventure" game, the boss battles never endâ€”each challenge more formidable than the last.
